00125         bool insert(const KeyType& key, const ValueType& value) {
00126 
00127                 SDBCursor locn;
00128                 if( search(key, locn) )
00129                 return false;
00130                 else {
00131                         char* ptr = 0;
00132                         char* ptr1 = 0;
00133                         size_t ksize;
00134                         size_t vsize;
00135                         izene_serialization<KeyType> izs(key);
00136                         izene_serialization<ValueType> izs1(value);
00137                         izs.write_image(ptr, ksize);
00138                         izs1.write_image(ptr1, vsize);  
00139                         
00140                         bucket_chain* sa = locn.first;
00141                         char* p = locn.second;
00142 
00143                         //entry_[idx] is even NULL.
00144                         if(locn.first == NULL) {
00145                                 uint32_t idx = sdb_hashing::hash_fun(ptr, ksize) & dmask_;                              ;
00146 
00147                                 if (bucketAddr[idx] == 0) {
00148                                         entry_[idx] = allocateBlock_();
00149                                         bucketAddr[idx] = entry_[idx]->fpos;
00150 
00151                                         sa = entry_[idx];
00152                                         p = entry_[idx]->str;
00153                                 }
00154                         }
00155                         else
00156                         {
00157                                 assert(locn.second != NULL);
00158                                 size_t gap = sizeof(long)+sizeof(int)+ksize+vsize+2*sizeof(size_t);
00159 
00160                                 //add an extra size_t to indicate if reach the end of  bucket_chain.
00161                                 if ( size_t(p - sa->str)> sfh_.bucketSize-gap-sizeof(size_t) ) {
00162                                         if (sa->next == 0) {
00163                                                 sa->isDirty = true;
00164                                                 sa->next = allocateBlock_();
00165                                         }
00166                                         sa = sa->loadNext(dataFile_);
00167                                         p = sa->str;
00168                                 }
00169                         }
00170 
00171                         memcpy(p, &ksize, sizeof(size_t));
00172                         p += sizeof(size_t);
00173                         memcpy(p, &vsize, sizeof(size_t));
00174                         p += sizeof(size_t);
00175                         memcpy(p, ptr, ksize);
00176                         p += ksize;
00177                         memcpy(p, ptr1, vsize);
00178                         p += vsize;
00179 
00180                         assert( size_t (p-sa->str) + sizeof(long) + sizeof(int) <= sfh_.bucketSize);
00181 
00182                         sa->isDirty = true;
00183                         sa->num++;
00184                         ++sfh_.numItems;
00185                         return true;
00186                 }
00187 
00188         }
00189 
00194         ValueType* find(const KeyType & key) {
00195 
00196                 SDBCursor locn;
00197                 if( !search(key, locn) )
00198                 return NULL;
00199                 else {
00200                         char *p = locn.second;
00201                         size_t ksz, vsz;
00202                         memcpy(&ksz, p, sizeof(size_t));
00203                         p += sizeof(size_t);
00204                         memcpy(&vsz, p, sizeof(size_t));
00205                         p += sizeof(size_t);
00206 
00207                         ValueType *val = new ValueType;
00208                         izene_deserialization<ValueType> isd(p+ksz, vsz);
00209                         isd.read_image(*val);
00210                         return val;
00211                 }
00212         }

00275         bool update(const KeyType& key, const ValueType& value) {
00276                 SDBCursor locn;
00277                 if( !search(key, locn) )
00278                 return insert(key, value);
00279                 else
00280                 {
00281                         char* ptr;
00282                         char* ptr1;
00283                         size_t ksize;
00284                         size_t vsize;
00285                         izene_serialization<KeyType> izs(key);
00286                         izene_serialization<ValueType> izs1(value);
00287                         izs.write_image(ptr, ksize);
00288                         izs1.write_image(ptr1, vsize);
00289 
00290                         bucket_chain* sa = locn.first;
00291                         char *p = locn.second;
00292                         size_t ksz, vsz;
00293                         memcpy(&ksz, p, sizeof(size_t));
00294                         p += sizeof(size_t);
00295                         memcpy(&vsz, p, sizeof(size_t));
00296                         p += sizeof(size_t);
00297                         if(vsz == vsize)
00298                         {
00299                                 sa->isDirty = true;
00300                                 memcpy(p+ksz, ptr1, vsz);
00301                                 return true;
00302                         }
00303                         else
00304                         {
00305                                 sa->isDirty = true;
00306                                 //delete it first!
00307                                 memset(p, 0xff, ksize);
00308                                 return insert(key, value);
00309                         }
00310                         return true;
00311                 }
00312 
00313         }

00320         SDBCursor search(const KeyType& key)

00331         bool search(const KeyType &key, SDBCursor &locn)
00332         {
00333                 flushCache_();
00334 
00335                 locn.first = NULL;
00336                 locn.second = NULL;
00337 
00338                 char* ptr=0;
00339                 size_t ksize;
00340                 izene_serialization<KeyType> izs(key);
00341                 izs.write_image(ptr, ksize);
00342 
00343                 uint32_t idx = sdb_hashing::hash_fun(ptr, ksize) & dmask_;              
00344                 locn.first = entry_[idx];
00345 
00346                 if (entry_[idx] == NULL) {
00347                         return false;
00348                 } else {
00349                         int i = 0;
00350                         bucket_chain* sa = entry_[idx];
00351                         char* p = sa->str;
00352 
00353                         while ( sa ) {
00354                                 locn.first = sa;
00355                                 //cout<<"search level: "<<sa->level<<endl;
00356                                 p = sa->str;
00357                                 //if( !p )return false;
00358                                 for (i=0; i<sa->num; i++) {
00359                                         size_t ksz, vsz;
00360                                         memcpy(&ksz, p, sizeof(size_t));
00361                                         p += sizeof(size_t);
00362                                         memcpy(&vsz, p, sizeof(size_t));
00363                                         p += sizeof(size_t);
00364 
00365                                         //cout<<ksz<<endl;
00366                                         //cout<<vsz<<endl;
00367 
00368                                         if (ksz != ksize) {
00369                                                 p += ksz + vsz;
00370                                                 continue;
00371                                         }
00372 
00373                                         char *pd = ptr;
00374                                         size_t j=0;
00375                                         for (; j<ksz; j++) {
00376                                                 //cout<<pd[j]<<" vs "<<p[j]<<endl;
00377                                                 if (pd[j] != p[j]) {
00378                                                         break;
00379                                                 }
00380                                         }
00381 
00382                                         if (j == ksz) {
00383                                                 locn.second = p-2*sizeof(size_t);
00384                                                 //cout<<key<<" found"<<endl;
00385                                                 return true;
00386                                         }
00387                                         p += ksz + vsz;
00388                                 }
00389                                 sa = sa->loadNext(dataFile_);
00390                         }
00391                         locn.second = p;
00392                 }
00393                 return false;
00394         }

00427         bool get(const SDBCursor& locn, DataType& rec) {
00428 
00429                 bucket_chain* sa = locn.first;
00430                 char* p = locn.second;
00431 
00432                 if(sa == NULL)return false;
00433                 if(p == NULL)return false;
00434 
00435                 size_t ksize, vsize;
00436                 //DbObjPtr ptr, ptr1;
00437                 //char* ptr, ptr1;
00438 
00439                 KeyType key;
00440                 ValueType val;
00441 
00442                 memcpy(&ksize, p, sizeof(size_t));
00443                 p += sizeof(size_t);
00444                 memcpy(&vsize, p, sizeof(size_t));
00445                 p += sizeof(size_t);
00446 
00447                 izene_deserialization<KeyType> izs(p, ksize);
00448                 izs.read_image(key);
00449                 p += ksize;
00450 
00451                 izene_deserialization<ValueType> izs1(p, vsize);
00452                 izs1.read_image(val);
00453                 p += vsize;
00454 
00455                 rec.key = key;
00456                 rec.value = val;
00457 
00458                 return true;
00459 
00460         }

00470         bool seq(SDBCursor& locn, DataType& rec, ESeqDirection sdir=ESD_FORWARD) {
00471                 flushCache_(locn);
00472                 if( sdir == ESD_FORWARD ) {
00473                         bucket_chain* sa = locn.first;
00474                         char* p = locn.second;
00475 
00476                         if(sa == NULL)return false;
00477                         if(p == NULL)return false;
00478 
00479                         size_t ksize, vsize;
00480                         //DbObjPtr ptr, ptr1;   
00481                         char* ptr;
00482                         size_t poff;
00483                         KeyType key;
00484                         ValueType val;
00485 
00486                         while(true) {
00487 
00488                                 memcpy(&ksize, p, sizeof(size_t));
00489                                 p += sizeof(size_t);
00490                                 memcpy(&vsize, p, sizeof(size_t));
00491                                 p += sizeof(size_t);
00492 
00493                                 bool isContinue = false;
00494                                 //to determine if encountered item is deleted.
00495                                 char *a = new char[ksize];
00496                                 memset(a, 0xff, ksize);
00497                                 if(memcmp(p, a, ksize) == 0) {
00498                                         delete a;
00499                                         a = 0;
00500                                         isContinue = true;
00501                                 }
00502                                 delete a;
00503                                 a = 0;
00504 
00505                                 ptr = p;
00506                                 poff = ksize;
00507                                 izene_deserialization<KeyType> izd(p, ksize);
00508                                 izd.read_image(key);
00509                                 p += ksize;
00510 
00511                                 izene_deserialization<ValueType> izd1(p, vsize);
00512                                 izd1.read_image(val);
00513                                 p += vsize;
00514 
00515                                 memcpy(&ksize, p, sizeof(size_t));
00516                                 if( ksize == 0 ) {
00517                                         sa = sa->loadNext(dataFile_);
00518                                         if( sa ) {
00519                                                 p = sa->str;
00520                                         }
00521                                         else
00522                                         {
00523                                                 uint32_t idx = sdb_hashing::hash_fun(ptr, poff) & dmask_;
00524                                                 while( !entry_[++idx] ) {
00525                                                         if( idx >= directorySize_-1 )
00526                                                         break;
00527                                                         //return false;
00528                                                 }
00529 
00530                                                 //get next bucket;
00531                                                 sa = entry_[idx];
00532                                                 if( sa ) p = sa->str;
00533                                                 else
00534                                                 p = NULL;
00535                                         }
00536                                 }
00537 
00538                                 if( isContinue )continue;
00539 
00540                                 //cout<<"!!!! seq "<<key<<endl;
00541                                 rec.key = key;
00542                                 rec.value = val;
00543                                 locn.first = sa;
00544                                 locn.second = p;
00545 
00546                                 return true;
00547 
00548                         }
00549                 } else
00550                 {
00551                         //it seems unecessary, for items are unordered.
00552                         return false;
00553                 }
00554         }

00567         bool open() {
00568                 struct stat statbuf;
00569                 bool creating = stat(fileName_.c_str(), &statbuf);
00570 
00571                 dataFile_ = fopen(fileName_.c_str(), creating ? "w+b" : "r+b");
00572                 if ( 0 == dataFile_) {
00573                         cout<<"Error in open(): open file failed"<<endl;
00574                         return false;
00575                 }
00576                 bool ret = false;
00577                 if (creating) {
00578 
00579                         // We're creating if the file doesn't exist.                    
00580 #ifdef DEBUG
00581                         cout<<"creating...\n"<<endl;
00582                         sfh_.display();
00583 #endif
00584                         bucketAddr = new long[directorySize_];
00585                         entry_ = new bucket_chain*[directorySize_];
00586 
00587                         //initialization
00588                         memset(bucketAddr, 0, sizeof(long)*directorySize_);
00589                         memset(entry_ , 0, sizeof(bucket_chain*)*directorySize_);
00590 
00591                         sfh_.toFile(dataFile_);
00592                         ret = true;
00593                 } else {
00594                         if ( !sfh_.fromFile(dataFile_) ) {
00595                                 return false;
00596                         } else {
00597                                 if (sfh_.magic != 0x061561) {
00598                                         cout<<"Error, read wrong file header_\n"<<endl;
00599                                         return false;
00600                                 }
00601 #ifdef DEBUG
00602                                 cout<<"open exist...\n"<<endl;
00603                                 sfh_.display();
00604 #endif
00605                                 directorySize_ = (1<<sfh_.dpow);
00606                                 dmask_ = directorySize_ - 1;
00607 
00608                                 bucketAddr = new long[directorySize_];
00609                                 entry_ = new bucket_chain*[directorySize_];
00610                                 memset(bucketAddr, 0, sizeof(long)*directorySize_);
00611                                 memset(entry_ , 0, sizeof(bucket_chain*)*directorySize_);
00612 
00613                                 if (directorySize_ != fread(bucketAddr, sizeof(long),
00614                                                                 directorySize_, dataFile_))
00615                                 return false;
00616                                 for (size_t i=0; i<directorySize_; i++) {
00617                                         if (bucketAddr[i] != 0) {                                               
00618                                                 entry_[i] = new bucket_chain(sfh_.bucketSize);
00619                                                 entry_[i]->fpos = bucketAddr[i];
00620                                                 entry_[i]->read(dataFile_);
00621                                         }
00622                                 }
00623                                 ret = true;
00624                         }
00625                 }
00626                 isOpen_ = true;
00627                 return ret;
00628         }
00632         bool close()
00633         {
00634                 flush();
00635                 for (size_t i=0; i<directorySize_; i++)
00636                 {
00637                         while(entry_[i])
00638                         {
00639                                 bucket_chain* sc = entry_[i]->next;
00640                                 delete entry_[i];
00641                                 entry_[i] = 0;
00642                                 entry_[i] = sc;
00643                         }
00644 
00645                 }
00646                 delete [] entry_;
00647                 entry_ = 0;
00648 
00649                 delete [] bucketAddr;
00650                 bucketAddr = 0;
00651                 fclose(dataFile_);
00652                 dataFile_ = 0;
00653                 return true;
00654         }
00659         void commit() {
00660                 sfh_.toFile(dataFile_);
00661                 if (directorySize_ != fwrite(bucketAddr, sizeof(long),
00662                                                 directorySize_, dataFile_) )
00663                 return;
00664                 for (size_t i=0; i<directorySize_; i++) {
00665                         bucket_chain* sc = entry_[i];
00666                         while (sc) {
00667                                 if ( sc->write(dataFile_) ) {
00668                                         sc = sc->next;
00669                                 } else {
00670                                         //sc->display();
00671                                         assert(0);
00672                                 }
00673                         }
00674                 }
00675                 fflush(dataFile_);
00676         }
00681         void flush() {
00682                 commit();
00683                 for (size_t i=0; i<directorySize_; i++) {
00684                         if(entry_[i]) {
00685                                 bucket_chain* sc = entry_[i]->next;
00686                                 bucket_chain* sa;
00687                                 while ( sc ) {
00688                                         sa = sc->next;
00689                                         if( sc) {
00690                                                 sc->unload();
00691                                                 //delete sc;
00692                                                 //sc = 0;
00693                                         }
00694                                         sc = sa;
00695                                 }
00696                         }
00697                 }
00698         }
00702         void display(std::ostream& os = std::cout, bool onlyheader = true) {
00703                 sfh_.display(os);
00704                 os<<"activeNum: "<<bucket_chain::activeNum<<endl;
00705                 os<<"loadFactor: "<<loadFactor()<<endl;
00706 
00707                 if( !onlyheader ) {
00708                         for (size_t i=0; i<directorySize_; i++) {
00709                                 os<<"["<<i<<"]: ";
00710                                 if (entry_[i])
00711                                 entry_[i]->display(os);
00712                                 os<<endl;
00713                         }
00714                 }
00715 
00716         }
00717 
00728         double loadFactor()
00729         {
00730                 int nslot = 0;
00731                 for (size_t i=0; i<directorySize_; i++) {
00732                         bucket_chain* sc = entry_[i];
00733                         while (sc) {
00734                                 nslot += sc->num;
00735                                 sc = sc->loadNext(dataFile_);
00736                         }
00737                 }
00738                 if(nslot == 0 )return 0.0;
00739                 else
00740                 return double(sfh_.numItems)/nslot;
00741 
00742         }

00767         bucket_chain* allocateBlock_() {
00768                 //cout<<"allocateBlock idx="<<sfh_.nBlock<<endl;
00769                 bucket_chain* newBlock;
00770                 newBlock = new bucket_chain(sfh_.bucketSize);
00771                 newBlock->str = new char[sfh_.bucketSize-sizeof(long)-sizeof(int)];
00772                 memset(newBlock->str, 0, sfh_.bucketSize-sizeof(long)-sizeof(int));
00773                 newBlock->isLoaded = true;
00774                 newBlock->isDirty = true;
00775 
00776                 newBlock->fpos = sizeof(ShFileHeader) + sizeof(long)*directorySize_ + sfh_.bucketSize*sfh_.nBlock;
00777                 sfh_.nBlock++;
00778 
00779                 bucket_chain::activeNum++;
00780 
00781                 return newBlock;
00782         }
00783 
00788         void flushCache_(bool quickFlush = false)
00789         {
00790 
00791                 //cout<<bucket_chain::activeNum<<" vs "<<sfh_.cacheSize <<endl;
00792                 if( bucket_chain::activeNum> sfh_.cacheSize )
00793                 {
00794                         flushCacheImpl_(quickFlush);                    
00795                 }               
00796         }
00797 
00798         void flushCache_(SDBCursor &locn)
00799         {
00800                 //cout<<bucket_chain::activeNum<<" vs "<<sfh_.cacheSize <<endl;
00801                 if( bucket_chain::activeNum> sfh_.cacheSize )
00802                 {
00803                         KeyType key;
00804                         ValueType value;
00805                         get(locn, key, value);
00806                         flushCacheImpl_();
00807                         search(key, locn);                      
00808                 }
00809 
00810         }
00811 
00812         void flushCacheImpl_(bool quickFlush = false)
00813         {
00814 #ifdef DEBUG
00815                 cout<<"cache is full..."<<endl;
00816                 cout<<bucket_chain::activeNum<<" vs "<<sfh_.cacheSize <<endl;
00817 #endif 
00818                 if( !quickFlush )commit();
00819                 for(size_t i=0; i<directorySize_; i++) {
00820                         bucket_chain* sc = entry_[i];
00821                         while( sc ) {
00822                                 //if(  sc->level>0 && (size_t)sc->level > sfh_.cacheSize/sfh_.directorySize/2 - 1 )
00823                                 if( sc->level>0 )
00824                                 {
00825                                         if(sc->isLoaded)
00826                                         sh_cache_.insert(make_pair(sc->level, sc ));
00827                                 }
00828                                 sc = sc->next;
00829                         }
00830                 }
00831                 //cout<<sh_cache_.size()<<endl;                         
00832                 for(CacheIter it = sh_cache_.begin(); it != sh_cache_.end(); it++ )
00833                 {
00834 
00835                         //display cache
00836                         /*cout<<"(level: "<<it->second->level;
00837                          cout<<"  val:  "<<it->second;
00838                          cout<<"  fpos: "<<it->second->fpos;    
00839                          cout<<"  num: "<<it->second->num;              
00840                          cout<<" )-> ";*/
00841 
00842                         if(quickFlush)
00843                         it->second->write(dataFile_);
00844                         it->second->unload();
00845                         if( bucket_chain::activeNum < sfh_.cacheSize/2 ) {
00846                                 fflush(dataFile_);
00847                                 sh_cache_.clear();
00848 
00849                                 //cout<<" !!!! "<<bucket_chain::activeNum<<" vs "<<sfh_.cacheSize <<endl;
00850                                 //display();
00851 
00852                                 return;
00853                         }
00854                 }
00855                 fflush(dataFile_);
00856                 sh_cache_.clear();
00857 
00858                 //cout<<" !!!! "<<bucket_chain::activeNum<<" vs "<<sfh_.cacheSize <<endl;
00859                 //display();    
00860 
00861         }
00862 
00863 };
00864 
00865 NS_IZENELIB_AM_END
00866 
00867 #endif
